result.execSummary:
Brandon L Sanderson was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Brandon L Sanderson was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon L Sanderson

records.addlTxt: Signed by the defendant and SJN on 7/19/2022. mw

3:16 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Brandon L Sanderson in court in custody. Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Brandon L Sanderson. DE sworn. DE confirms address and DOB. Defendant wishes to voluntarily waive extradition to Washington County, MN. Court finds DE's decision to waive extradition knowing and intelligent. Defendant executes Waiver and court certifies same.  Adjourned: 3:20 PM. kma
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for July 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Bail/bond hearing on July 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:16 PM  CO: TCH, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: B Harris, Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court with intern Conner Smith for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Brandon L Sanderson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Brandon L Sanderson. Court states this will need to be scheduled with Judge Vlack or Judge Nordstrand for a later time today.  JA to schedule.  Adjourned at 1:23 PM. bph
